newsitem.title: USA: Union Corp says Hewitt adds title of CEO.
newsitem.headline: Union Corp says Hewitt adds title of CEO.

text.p: Union Corp said on Tuesday that its president and chief operating officer William Hewitt had been named to the additional post of chief executive officer, effective July 1.
Hewitt succeeds Melvin Cooper in the role of chief executive; Cooper will remain with the company in his present post of chairman, the company said.

Hewitt joined Union Corp in 1991 as chairman and chief executive of its Capital Credit Corp subsidiary. Prior to that, he was a founding partner and executive vice president at First Manhattan Consulting Corp, a management consulting firm serving the financial services industry.
Union Corp provides specialized credit and receivable management outsourcing services.
